name: kyc-analyst
description: Fully interactive KYC/AML compliance automation with mandatory Step 0 independent verification (AMLD5 Article 10), guided Q&A workflows, automatic case folder creation, Excel dashboards, PDF reports, immutable audit trails, and practical copy-paste workflow templates. All 6 commands (onboard, onboard-interactive, refresh, screen, monitor, risk) with step-by-step guidance and HITL checkpoints.

version_history.1.0.0: Initial release with practical workflow templates and HITL workflows
version_history.2.1.0: Added interactive mode, Excel reports, case folder management
version_history.2.2.0: Auto case folder creation, locked templates, comprehensive documentation
version_history.2.3.0: Final locked version: 17 mandatory stagegates, MCP connector integration (Chrome, PDF, Excel), HITL enforcement, fpdf2/openpyxl report generation

commands.onboard: Customer onboarding with mandatory Step 0 independent verification
commands.onboard-interactive: Interactive dialog-based onboarding with step-by-step guidance
commands.refresh: Periodic customer review with independent verification
commands.screen: Sanctions and PEP screening with comprehensive searches
commands.risk: Risk reassessment with updated due diligence

features.step0Verification: Mandatory independent verification (5 searches: Adverse Media, Directorships, PEP, Professional Background, Sanctions/Crime)
features.workflowTemplates: Copy-paste templates for 5+ scenarios (Individual, HNWI, SME, Complex Corporate, Refresh)
features.connectorIntegration: Tool-agnostic ~~placeholder system for cloud storage, CRM, browser, email
features.interactiveMode: Step-by-step Q&A guidance for all workflows
features.caseFolderManagement: Auto-created case folders with numbered, organized substructure
features.auditTrail: Auto-generated immutable chronological log for regulatory compliance
features.heuristicRiskScoring: Deterministic four-factor risk scoring (Geographic 30%, Customer 35%, Product 25%, Channel 10%)
features.escalationRouting: Automatic escalation for critical findings and material misrepresentations
features.hitlCheckpoints: Explicit Human-in-the-Loop decision points throughout all workflows
features.stagegateEnforcement: 17 mandatory sequential stagegates with explicit analyst consent at each gate
features.mcpIntegration: Claude in Chrome (browser), fpdf2 (PDF), openpyxl (Excel) with tool-agnostic ~~placeholder system
features.icijOffshoreSearch: Search 1.5: ICIJ Offshore Leaks Database (Panama Papers, Paradise Papers, Pandora Papers)

regulatory_compliance.AMLD5_Article_10: Independent verification requirement implemented and enforced
regulatory_compliance.UK_MLR_2017_Regulation_19: Customer information verification using reliable sources
regulatory_compliance.FCA_Guidance: Robust Customer Due Diligence procedures with proportionate approach
